midas/examples/basic/minirc.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         minirc.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     A "Mini-Run Control" program showing the basic concept
00007                 of starting/stopping runs in the MIDAS system
00008 
00009   $Log: minirc.c,v $
00010   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:10  mucap
00011   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00012   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00013 
00014   Revision 1.3  2004/01/08 08:40:08  midas
00015   Implemented standard indentation
00016 
00017   Revision 1.2  1998/10/12 12:18:58  midas
00018   Added Log tag in header
00019 
00020 
00021 \********************************************************************/
00022 
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include "midas.h"
00026 
00027 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 
00029 main()
00030 {
00031    INT run_number, status;
00032    char host_name[256];
00033    char str[256];
00034 
00035    printf("Host to connect: ");
00036    ss_gets(host_name, 256);
00037 
00038    /* connect to experiment */
00039    status = cm_connect_experiment(host_name, "", "MiniRC", NULL);
00040    if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00041       return 1;
00042 
00043    printf("Enter run number: ");
00044    ss_gets(str, 256);
00045    run_number = atoi(str);
00046 
00047    printf("Start run\n");
00048 
00049    /* start run */
00050    if (cm_transition(TR_START, run_number, str, sizeof(str), SYNC) != CM_SUCCESS)
00051       printf(str);
00052 
00053    printf("Hit RETURN to stop run");
00054    getchar();
00055 
00056    /* stop run */
00057    if (cm_transition(TR_STOP, run_number, str, sizeof(str), SYNC) != CM_SUCCESS)
00058       printf(str);
00059 
00060    cm_disconnect_experiment();
00061 
00062    return 1;
00063 }
